name: Cheryl Johnson
text: I received great customer service from a kind and attentive worker at this location, his friendliness made my day.. My pizza was delish, made right and cooked to perfection! ...As always! ..Very happy customer! Keep up the good work!

name: The Pizza 411
text: I'm not sure what I just ate! lol Wow.. okay...I ALWAYS start craving food just as all my favorite places are closing. Tonight was no different and al my go to places were closed. Choices now are limited to McDonald's, Wendy's, Denny's, ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Dangel
text: I love this Hungry Howies!! You can taste that its made with love.üòç

name: amanda bell
text: No matter how many good pizza places there are in my area, hungry howie's is always my go to pizza place when I am flat broke.  Good stuff.

name: Oliver Carter
text: I threw the personal pizza that was made away because I saw several hairs. Service was barely tolerable.

name: Katie Gundel
text: Great service great food great prices

name: Kimberly Feiner
text: This is and has been my family's favorite pizza for years (we love the herb crust) and only recently ordered the subs and salads.   Did not disappoint!   Customer service has always been outstanding, but tonight it was exceptional!  Thank you to the gentleman working tonight!

name: Jaxen Garcia
text: Been living in Phoenix for one year and this is the first pizza place I enjoyed the pizza. They earned a lifelong Customer.

name: Rachel Lynette Koehn.Kennedy
text: I freaking love them!

name: Kirk Pfeil
text: The employees are wonderful and the Pizza is even better. I am truly disturbed though by the owners of where Hungry Howies is because for at least the last year that I have been going there the air conditioning at this low action is not working a d the portable air conditioner is not nearly enough...great pizza though

name: Hope for Christ
text: Yummy pizza, decent prices, and friendly service.

name: Amber Davenport
text: I am a fan of the crust flavors.  They mix their dough and roll it out on site (not frozen disks that other stores are shipped and they rise for an hour or two) with the exception of the thin crusts.

name: Travis Lee
text: Not the best in the city but not the worst in the city

name: Victor A Anaya
text: Great tasting pizza/flavored crusts!  Great prices!

name: Frank Mahon
text: Great food , fast service .

name: Sean #Dachshund4life
text: Had 2 pizza n garlic bread delivered, garlic bread was burnt and tasted gross.. The pizza is way to salty and greasy... Frist n last time for me... byeeeeee....

name: Lauren Sanchez
text: Love this pizza so good and cheap

name: Adam W
text: Love the pizza

name: Ceraela Otero
text: The pizza is always freshly done, I've gotten the small $5 pizza and the calzones several times and they have never disappointed me. Good idea to use gloves to eat as the freshness makes it really messy, also the five dollar pizza can feed two people easily

name: Joe Montella
text: At least they will do it your way, I always order it 1/2 cooked, not cut and just cheese so I can put real sliced Italian sausage, sauteed onions and fresh roasted garlic then I finish baking on a stone in my oven to get a nice crispy crust.  Most places won't accommodate that

name: Rose Wehrenberg
text: Always great service at the Bell and 67th ave. location!

name: Rickeyrecon
text: Not too bad price is perfect...

name: Tammy Plouffe
text: Yummy garlic crust

name: Kyle Preston
text: Employees have very good customer service skills gave me the best deal possible for the specials they we're running without asking me

name: Scott Woosley
text: Love the pizza and flavored crust.

name: Victoria Gibson
text: It was very good pizza, and very affordable!

name: Justin Baker
text: Good food and reasonably priced

name: Richard Davis
text: Not even close to the way it should be,  pizza burned,  toppings hard and very done,  the smell from the time we walked in should have been the first clue it wasn't going to get better,  many other HH pizza, I will find one not close to go to

name: Simon Orbulescu
text: excellent staff - very friendly, fast service and on top of that enjoyed the pizza as well. will return again!

name: Tonya Jacobs
text: Had to wait over 23 minutes for a simple commonly requested "PEPPERONI PIZZA." Little Cesar's üçï makes this establishment....not even going there!!!

name: Marilyn Kemper
text: That ain't pizza, that's a oil slick.

name: Christina Stephens
text: I ordered a pizza at around 8pm. It is midnight and they have been closed over an hour and my pizza has not come. No phone call to let me know it would be late, nothing. But they sure didn't forget to charge my card. I have a hungry 3 year ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Champlin
text: Fast friendly service.

name: Teisha Alcala
text: They have some hick ups sometimes but no one is perfect..  I love there style of pizza and having flavor chooses for my crust is cool no one els does that...

name: Kenneth Gibson
text: Staff is funny, yet professional. Great food, great company and its not papa johns. Wins all the way around

name: Amanda Ave
text: I have always enjoyed the food here. My kids are now all grown up but still order Hungry Howie's.

name: Jason Russell
text: Great service. Great product for the money.

name: Emily Thiessen
text: Really great pizza! The flavored crust is a must have, and a great addition to any pizza. Fast service too!!

name: Mackenzie Sullivan
text: My order was all wrong. They didn't put any seasoning on the crust of our pizza. I ordered a calzone as well and they gave us a roll thing instead that was brunt on the outside and all doughy on the inside. I usually really enjoy hungry Howie's but this location and experience was awful.

name: patrick ciezki
text: The pizza here is amazing and it's not overpriced.

name: Reid W
text: Hungry Howie's is A+ Great pizza! Some of the best pizza the Phoenix area has to offer!! Highly recommend!

name: BigNiggaShitOnly Dawg
text: Horrible place didn't answer the phone when I called five times and they're open for the next 2 hours when I called. What kind of business is this never had this happen before will be looking elsewhere for pizza next time O and when I do get pizza they have so much grease on its literally soggy yuck!

name: Shana Joseph
text: Pizza is decent but calling to place an order is such a pain! You have to sit thru 10 minutes of the automated sales pitch. Annoying!

name: Vanessa Gambs
text: Horrible service!!! I ordered hours in advance for an event with a tight timeline allowing for a 15 min delivery window and they were over a half hour late! No apologies - rather the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù yelled at me - the customer - for being upset ‚Ä¶More

name: Mr. Pogi
text: Imo, pretty good pizza and price. Can't beat the flavored crust too. No complaints here!

name: Don Penrod
text: Real small place very very good pizza excellent service at the right price you've got to try the cheesy bread it is truly awesome I would recommend this to anybody that would ask for a quick pizza place to buy pizza two thumbs up

name: David Johnston
text: Good pizza

name: Darlene James
text: Always a pleasant experience when I eat from here, Devin is super courtious and very helpful. Don't know where all these negative reviews come from

name: Patrick Keifer
text: Great sub sandwiches...

name: Carlos Danger
text: I bought steak howies roll 03/27/17. I was very  disappointed the meat portion was a very small it was mostl dough. They are  skimming on meat at this location. You will know the  difference when you have had the same thing at another ‚Ä¶More

name: kenmaster1812
text: Called them 5 minutes ago, to place an order for delivery and they didnt have a driver. Uhh, a pizza place doesnt have a driver for delivery? Ouch.. they have good pizza too. 9:15 pm on a mon night

name: Youth Gone Awry
text: Amazing pizza as always, and awesome delivery drivers!

name: justowit idoitwithchains
text: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE, GREAT CRUST, GREAT PIZZA, GREAT CHICKEN AND AWESOME DELIVERY! THANK YOU!

name: carol gallagher
text: Always good pizza at great prices!

name: Jason Thomas
text: Great price for good pizza

name: Stacy Davis
text: Great food

name: Jonni Greenberg
text: Great pizza, fast service.

name: Paula Svendsen
text: Gentleman that helped me was really nice. Pizza was exactly as ordered.

name: Victoria Lott
text: Great crust and topping selection

name: I'm Amanda I'm NEW
text: Good food grate price

name: Paul Sandoval
text: Great pizza!!!!

name: Tracy Reyna
text: Good food

name: Thomas Marini
text: good

name: Zekija Hadzic
text: Delicious

name: ROBERT TYREE
text: Pizza was excellent!

name: Preston PfunkBrn Brown
text: Have yet to eat here but from the answer to my Question I'm looking forward to going.

name: Justin Nye
text: They dont want to do anything that might make them stay late. I called for delivery 15 minutes before they closed and im only a mile away

name: boom bang
text: Thank you for your kind service

name: Jill Miracle-Donahoo
text: Good food

name: Ashton Chaney
text: Very small but good service

name: Reality In America
text: Everyone that has issues please retry the store.. there is a new GM currently trying to rework all the issues for this store.. thank you.

name: Nicholas Sova
text: Flavored Crust!

name: Sarah Lowry-Nevarez
text: My order was wrong and I was advised it would be remade and sent out. Here I am exactly 2 hours later still waiting on that order that they remade to be redelivered!  Now I just want my money back!!!
